name: Parkcore Game
description:
Welcome to a game that invokes parkcore and a pistol which these help reveal and solve puzzle.

This is a little project that I’m working on on my free time but I would like to try to make it a full blown game.

This game was submitted too the 7dfps game jam

This game involves you the player to locate Red Orbs to advance to the next level I added some tips to tell you where they are located in each level, Also in each level you have to use your pistol to shoot at walls to make a path or even your self to reveal secret or shortcuts to get to the red orbs.

Also I don’t know how to change the page’s colour but I’ll change it later

Controls 

W, A, S, D for movement 

Space bar is to jump

Left mouse button to shoot 

Esc key is to exit out of the game

T to reload scene 

R to reload
